forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 65, with temperatures falling to around 63 in the afternoon. North wind 3 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 51. West southwest wind 2 to 9 mph.

weather_report:
As dawn breaks over Downtown San Francisco, a gentle warmth begins to sweep through the city, promising a gloriously clear day ahead. The morning sun casts a soft glow, illuminating the iconic skyline while vanquishing the vestiges of night. Expect temperatures to climb near mid-60s, perfect for a leisurely stroll or a stop at your favorite café. The mild north wind whispers through the streets, adding a refreshing touch to the day, while the air clarity invites exploration, unmarred by fog or marine layer.

As the afternoon approaches, you might find temperatures dipping slightly, a gentle reminder of the coastal cool that often defines this cherished urban backdrop. The evening will greet you with partially cloudy skies, transitioning to a comfortably cool night with temperatures sliding down to around 51. As the sun sets, layered clothing will keep you cozy—perhaps a light sweater or a jacket works best. This inviting weather sets the stage for a variety of pleasant activities: consider a leisurely bike ride along the Embarcadero, an intimate gathering with friends at a rooftop bar, or a quiet evening walk through one of the city’s lovely parks as the sun fades into the horizon, painting the sky with soft pastels.
